apiKeyInput.label: Google AI Studio API Key
apiKeyInput.placeholder: Enter your Google AI Studio API Key
apiKeyInput.hintText: Visit {link} to get your free Google AI Studio API key. It's completely free and safe from Google. They only train on publicly available data and do not use your API requests for training.
apiKeyInput.invalidKey: Please enter a valid API key

hashtagGenerator.label: Enter your text here
hashtagGenerator.placeholder: Paste your content here to generate relevant hashtags...

cpmCalculator.title: YouTube CPM Calculator
cpmCalculator.description: Estimate your YouTube earnings based on your niche and target audience
cpmCalculator.resultDescription: Your estimated CPM (Cost Per Mille) is
cpmCalculator.disclaimer: Note: These are estimates based on industry data. Actual earnings may vary significantly based on content quality, audience engagement, and ad performance.

thumbnailDownloader.title: YouTube Thumbnail Downloader
thumbnailDownloader.description: Enter a YouTube video URL to view and download available thumbnails.

thumbnailPreviewer.title: YouTube Thumbnail Previewer
thumbnailPreviewer.description: Preview your thumbnails on different devices and themes
thumbnailPreviewer.uploadDescription: Upload an image to see it in the preview

silenceRemover.title: Silence Remover
silenceRemover.tip1: Support common audio formats like MP3, WAV, M4A.
silenceRemover.tip2: For video we will process the audio track then remux later.
silenceRemover.tip3: Everything runs locally in your browser.
silenceRemover.previewNote: Audio preview from the selected file.
silenceRemover.autoModeNote: Auto mode is enabled. Settings are adjusted automatically.
